name: cumin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a spice consisting of the pleasant-smelling seeds of a plant or a powder made from these seeds, used especially in South Asian and Western Asian cooking, or the plant itself: Stir in curry powder, black pepper, and ground cumin. I made chicken with cumin seeds.
